title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 380-7.6 - Rights under PFL
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 380-7.6 - Rights under PFL
State Regulations

Except as provided in section
380-2.6, employees cannot waive
their prospective rights under PFL. Under no circumstance may an employer
induce employees to waive any rights under PFL. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
380-7.6

Adopted

New

York State Register July 19, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 29, eff. 7/19/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
